comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 18, 2022, 05:37:48 PMI'm betting on F1 at the moment, I'm following the round of qualify team, and I've already seen that Ferrari has inserted his 4th motor for this seasonÂ  . Considering the round of penalty (Leclerc will start sundayÂ  in last place) my bet is that he will close race between 1st and 3rd place ! It isn't easy I know, but that guy is really angry and this helps meÂ  Yes, betting on F1 racing is indeed very exciting and does not make us as bettors bored watching the race.But on the other hand, betting on F1 is a bit difficult to predict now because there are still several teams that will compete.I myself am still confused and have not been able to determine which team is really good to bet on.Maybe later after observing and researching each new race I will be able to determine which team I will bet on and hopefully bring me good luck.
